edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train

Class AbstractFeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.AbstractFeatureExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureExtractor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CountFeatureExtractor, LexicalReorderingFeatureExtractor, MosesPharoahFeatureExtractor, PhiFeatureExtractor, ReorderingWithSyntaticPhrasalCategoryFeatureExtractor, SoftMosesPharoahFeatureExtractor, SparseVectorFeatureExtractor, SyntacticPhraseReorderingFeatureExtractor

    public abstract class AbstractFeatureExtractor
extends Object
implements FeatureExtractor
    Feature extractor offering default implementations for members of FeatureExtractor.
    Author:
    Michel Galley

      • init

        public void init(Properties prop,
        edu.stanford.nlp.util.Index<String> featureIndex,
        AlignmentTemplates alTemps)
        Initialize variables possibly needed by feature extractors.
        Parameters:
        prop - Command-line arguments.
        featureIndex - Index for feature names.
        alTemps - Set of all alignment templates seen so far in training data.

      • getRequiredPassNumber

        public int getRequiredPassNumber()
        Returns the number of passes over the entire training data are required by the feature extractor. Unless this method is overridden, the default is 1.
        Returns:
        number of required passes over training data

      • getCurrentPass

        protected int getCurrentPass()
        Returns the number of passes over training data that have been completed so far.
        Returns:
        current pass over training data

      • setCurrentPass

        public void setCurrentPass(int currentPass)
        Set the number of passes over training data that have been completed so far.
        Parameters:
        currentPass - current pass over training data

      • needAlGrid

        public boolean needAlGrid()
        By default, this class does not require an alignment grid for feature extraction.
        Specified by:
        needAlGrid in interface FeatureExtractor
        See Also:
        AlignmentGrid

      • scoreNames

        public Object scoreNames()
        By default, this class does not give names to features.

      • featurizePhrase

        public void featurizePhrase(AlignmentTemplateInstance alTemp,
                   AlignmentGrid alGrid)
        Empty phrase-level feature extractor.
        Specified by:
        featurizePhrase in interface FeatureExtractor
        Parameters:
        alTemp - A particular occurrence of an alignment template.
        alGrid - A two dimensional array, in which each cell (i,j) contains the set of AlignmentTemplateInstance objects that have one of their four corners lying at (i,j) in the alignment grid. Not that if FeatureExtractor.needAlGrid() returns false, alTemps is always null.

      • score

        public Object score(AlignmentTemplate alTemp)
        By default, this feature extractor returns null.
        Specified by:
        score in interface FeatureExtractor
        Parameters:
        alTemp - Alignment template to score.
        Returns:
        Feature values, which must either be represented as double[].

      • report

        public void report()
        Let each extractor output some stuff to STDERR.
        Specified by:
        report in interface FeatureExtractor
